verses.verse: O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, you have searched <S%H2713><s%> me <S%H3045><s%>, and known me.
You know <S%H3045><s%> my sitting <S%H3427><s%> and my standing <S%H6965><s%>, you understand <S%H995><s%> my thoughts <S%H7454><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>.
You search <S%H2219><s%> my path <S%H734><s%> and my lying down <S%H7252><s%>, and are acquainted <S%H5532><s%> with all my ways <S%H1870><s%>.
For there is not a word <S%H4405><s%> in my tongue <S%H3956><s%>, but <S%H3068><s%>, behold, O Lord, you know it altogether <S%H3045><s%>.
You have beset <S%H6696><s%> me behind <S%H268><s%> and before <S%H6924><s%>, and laid <S%H7896><s%> your hand upon me <S%H3709><s%>.
Such knowledge <S%H1847><s%> is too wonderful <S%H6383><s%> for me <S%H7682><s%>; it is high, I cannot attain unto it <S%H3201><s%>.
Where shall I go <S%H3212><s%> from your spirit <S%H7307><s%>? or where shall I flee <S%H1272><s%> from your presence <S%H6440><s%>?
If I ascend up <S%H5266><s%> into heaven <S%H8064><s%>, you are there <S%H3331><s%>: if I make my bed in hell <S%H7585><s%>, behold, you are there.
If I take <S%H5375><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the morning <S%H7837><s%>, and live <S%H7931><s%> in the outermost parts <S%H319><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>;
Even there shall your hand <S%H3027><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> me <S%H3225><s%>, and your right hand shall hold me <S%H270><s%>.
If I say <S%H559><s%>, Surely the darkness <S%H2822><s%> shall cover <S%H7779><s%> me <S%H3915><s%>; even the night shall be light <S%H216><s%> about me <S%H1157><s%>.

Yes <S%H2822><s%>, the darkness hides <S%H2821><s%> not from you <S%H3915><s%>; but the night shines <S%H215><s%> as the day <S%H3117><s%>: the darkness <S%H2825><s%> and the light are both alike to you <S%H219><s%>.
For you have possessed <S%H7069><s%> my minds <S%H3629><s%>: you have covered <S%H5526><s%> me in my mother <S%H517><s%>'s womb <S%H990><s%>.

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H3372><s%>; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made <S%H6395><s%>: marvelous <S%H6381><s%> are your works <S%H4639><s%>; and that my soul <S%H5315><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> right well <S%H3966><s%>.

My substance <S%H6108><s%> was not hid <S%H3582><s%> from you <S%H6213><s%>, when I was made in secret <S%H5643><s%>, and curiously done <S%H7551><s%> in the lowest parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> did see <S%H7200><s%> my substance <S%H1564><s%>, yet being unperfect; and in your book <S%H5612><s%> all my members were written <S%H3789><s%>, which in continuance <S%H3117><s%> were fashioned <S%H3335><s%>, when as yet there was none of them <S%H259><s%>.
How precious <S%H3365><s%> also are your thoughts <S%H7454><s%> unto me <S%H410><s%>, O God! how great <S%H6105><s%> is the sum of them <S%H7218><s%>!
If I should count <S%H5608><s%> them <S%H7235><s%>, they are more in number than the sand <S%H2344><s%>: when I awake <S%H6974><s%>, I am still with you <S%H5750><s%>.
Surely you will kill <S%H6991><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, O God <S%H433><s%>: depart <S%H5493><s%> from me therefore <S%H1818><s%>, you bloody men <S%H582><s%>.
For they speak <S%H559><s%> against you wickedly <S%H4209><s%>, and your enemies <S%H6145><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> your name in vain <S%H7723><s%>.
Do not I hate <S%H8130><s%> them <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, that hate <S%H8130><s%> you <S%H6962><s%>? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against you <S%H8618><s%>?
I hate <S%H8130><s%> them with perfect <S%H8503><s%> hatred <S%H8135><s%>: I count them my enemies <S%H341><s%>.
Search <S%H2713><s%> me <S%H410><s%>, O God, and know <S%H3045><s%> my heart <S%H3824><s%>: try <S%H974><s%> me <S%H3045><s%>, and know my thoughts <S%H8312><s%>:
And see <S%H7200><s%> if there be any wicked <S%H6090><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> in me <S%H5148><s%>, and lead me in the way <S%H1870><s%> everlasting <S%H5769><s%>.
